CustomField.description: Choose the privacy settings of the group: 1. Public - Open visibility; Open join process 2. Private - Restricted visibility; Approval based join process 3. Unlisted - Visible only to members, not searchable; Backend join process
CustomField.inlineHelpText: 1. Public - Open visibility; Open join process 2. Private - Restricted visibility; Approval based join process 3. Unlisted - Visible only to members, not searchable; Backend join process
CustomField.label: Privacy Setting
